reviews.review_msg: She is a very nice person, and you can see that she is passionate about politics and is a very knowledgeable person. She did a great job bringing exciting topics to talk about, and raised a lot interesting questions. She is very helpful, and is always there to help her students,and responds to emails extremely quick. The best TA i've had so far.
Very sweet lady, extremely dedicated and approachable.
What can I say about Sima.  She is an incredibly nice, friendly, funny, and helpful Professor.  I really enjoyed the course and look forward to taking future courses with her.  Sima ROCKS
